name: Meadow Factory
description:
As agreeable as a factory can be, in the nicest of meadows. What could go wrong?

You're the manager of a factory. You have some initial capital with which to begin your factory, so you add a chimney, hire some workers, and earn some tender. Amongst your prosperity you wonder, what does that bottom-right button do?

Credit for most of the assets goes to my friend Wiktor!

TIPS

  • W in top left = WORKERS
  • The more chimneys you have, the more total workers you can employ
  • Every rotation of the clock you receive your income
  • In brackets next to the number of workers is the income you will gain from them
  • If you end up in debt, don't worry - just wait
  • Look in the bottom right

Meadow Factory was made in 3 hours for the TriJam game jam #57.
Theme: "Factory".
Any feedback is appreciated in the comments.
Thanks for playing!
